headline: A better view for your business
headline-description: A business canvas application, recommended for all types of needs.
marketing-title: A canvas that fit your needs...
marketing-bmc-description: Plan your business from the start and focus on what matters.
marketing-lean-description: A quick way to validate your business idea.
marketing-media-description: Starting a new youtube channel, maybe a podcast, plan ahead and discover the problems that you may face along the road.
marketing-swot-description: Review the strenghts, weakness, opportunities and threats of your business or product.
marketing-product-description: Get a better view of your product, identifying your value proposition and opportunities.
marketing-custom-description: Can't find a canvas that fit your needs, create your own here.
share-error: Something happened and it was not possible to share the app.
share-unavailable: Sharing functionality is not available in your browser.
